definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
Adam Smith (1723-1790), Scottish ethical philosopher and pioneer economist, author of The Wealth of Nations 國富論|国富论
Joseph Smith, Jr. (1805-1844), founder of the Latter Day Saint movement

sentences.english: Yale University has contacted Mr. Schmidt concerning these rumors.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學就此謠言聯繫了斯密特先生。

sentences.english: Limited carbon dating undertaken by Schmidt at the site confirms this assessment.
sentences.chinese: 斯密特對此進行了限定碳定年檢測，確定了這一猜測。

sentences.english: Your name and address has been introduced to us by Messrs . J. Smith &Co. , Inc.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司的行名和地址是由斯密司公司向我方介紹的。

sentences.english: Joseph Smith was accepted as first elder, and prophet, seer, and revelator.
sentences.chinese: 斯密約瑟被接納爲第一大和先知，先知，和啓示。

sentences.english: He listened to Smillie's recounting of all the incriminating circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 他聽斯密裏把所有罪證確鑿的情況重新敘述了一遍。

sentences.english: Smee, " he said, "this seat is hot .
sentences.chinese: 斯密，“他說，”這個座位是熱的。

sentences.english: Professor Smith seems to be a fixture in the university.
sentences.chinese: 史斯密教授似乎在這所大學是個固定工作者。

sentences.english: Smith can be excused for his lack of interest in the course.
sentences.chinese: 斯密史對這門課不感興趣是可以理解的。

sentences.english: To Schmidt's eye, the shape stood out.
sentences.chinese: 在斯密特眼裏，這個造型很出彩。

sentences.english: Smyth died in a military prison in Ireland in 1997.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，斯密斯死於愛爾蘭的一間軍事監獄。

sentences.english: So Ms. Bajtelsmit decided to become a college professor.
sentences.chinese: 所以，巴特斯密特決定成爲一名大學教授。
斯密斯德站着，緘默不語。

definition: Adam Smith (1723-1790), Scottish ethical philosopher and pioneer economist, author of The Wealth of Nations 國富論|国富论
The Wealth of Nations (1776) by Adam Smith 亞當·斯密|亚当·斯密[Ya4 dang1 · Si1 mi4]
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
Friedrich Engels (1820-1895), socialist philosopher and one of the founder of Marxism
Baruch or Benedict Spinoza (1632-1677), rationalist philosopher
surname Althusser/Louis Pierre Althusser 路易·皮埃爾·阿爾都塞|路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞[Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1] (1918-1990), Marxist philosopher
Karl Marx (1818-1883), German socialist philosopher, political activist and founder of Marxism
